Description: Smoking pipe made of pottery, with a gourd mouthpiece
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: William Leonard Stevenson Loat
Acquisition notes: Af1933,0315.1 to 20 (Sudan/Uganda) and 51 to 67 (Egypt) are the African sections of the wide-ranging collection assembled by William Leonard Loat (1871-1932) on his travels round the world, and which he bequeathed to the British Museum. The register records his notes on where and when he acquired the pieces.
